projectManagers/{userId}.allow: read, update: if request.auth != null && request.auth.uid == userId;

companies/{companyId}.allow: read: if request.auth != null && companyId in get(/databases/$(database)/documents/projectManagers/$(request.auth.uid)).data.companyIds;

projects/{projectId}.allow: read, update: if request.auth != null && resource.data.projectManagerId == request.auth.uid;
